sys_element_mapping.value:
Hi Trigger - Record Created or Updated➛...➛Requested for,

Thank you for using the inventory management application. The item you ordered: Trigger➛...➛Item name is under review and is under going the necessary approvals to get it delivered to you. Wooden Edge Studios prides itself on providing employees the necessary machines and tools to continue to achieve excellence in elevating people's home. 

 

Sincerely,

CEO: Tomiwa Akinrotimi
Your request for: {{Created or Updated_1.current.u_item_name}} has been completed.

sys_element_mapping.value:
Hi Trigger - Record Created or Updated➛...➛Requested for,

Thank you for using the inventory management application. The item you ordered: Trigger➛...➛Item name is under review and is under going the necessary approvals to get it delivered to you. Wooden Edge Studios prides itself on providing employees the necessary machines and tools to continue to achieve excellence in elevating people's home. 

 

Sincerely,

CEO: Tomiwa Akinrotimi
Your request for: {{Created or Updated_1.current.u_item_name}} has been completed.
